QuestData.Title: Forever Young
QuestData.Description: All this sitting around is horrible for business.$b$bI have to find a way to recoup some of my lost profits.$b$bThose Draenei females are obsessed with the way their horns look.$b$bI overheard one of them talking about a root that grows in Blademoon Bloom that supposedly reduces horn shedding or something.$b$bI bet I could sell that root to them for a pretty nice profit.$b$bI'll give you a cut if you help me get a supply going.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm... How am I going to package this?$b$bI have an idea!$b$b<Beezil writes Youngroot on a label and slaps it onto a bottle of adder oil.>$b$b< He throws the Youngroot in the bushes behind him.>$b$bPerfect!
